name: Melody Dress-up Game
description:
Dress-up Melody from Memories on the Shoreline!

Just a small project I made over the weekend ♥ This was fun to make, so if you like it and want me to make more, just say so! Feel free to share your outfits down below~

Art: MikomiKisomi

Music: Jan Hehr

Click the image to play the demo for Memories on the Shoreline!
